availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, physician. Shelby County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Hickman and Mary M. Caldwell. Married to Sallie Ann Currey on October 1, 1851. Father of John W. Hickman. Married to Emily Wilson on February 14, 1860. Physician in Nelson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Bardstown, District 2, p. 6-7.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Film #, Nelson County, February 14, 1860.
John Carroll Power, History of the Early Settlers of Sangamon County, Illinois (Springfield, IL: Edwin A. Wilson & Co., 1876), 374-75.
